page.title: 06WORRIES AND FEARS IN 1985
page.content: The following information resulted from a discussion with a class of{ {24}9-11 year old girls and boys about their worries and fears in 1985 {OURSELVES 24 ---------pets dying 22 -------going to Clyst Vale Community college and taking exams. 23 ------getting involved with drugs. 19 -----prospect of not finding a job after leaving Clyst Vale. {OUR FAMILIES {24}-------family dying. {24}-------parents splitting up. {21}-------rows at home. {23}-------house burning down. {OUR COUNTRY} {17}-------nuclear war. {15}----keeping the good name of the country
